bookSourceGroup: 🔭 其他,🎊 常用,🎨 漫画
exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
title = [
    '全部',
    '连载',
    '完结'
];
var host = `{{Get('url')}}`;
url = [
    '`${host}/books?continued=undefined&page={{page-1}}`',
    '`${host}/books?continued=true&page={{page-1}}`',
    '`${host}/books?continued=false&page={{page-1}}`'
];
for (i in title) {
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], eval(url[i]), 1, -1, false));
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/127.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/127.0.0.0",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers"),JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>
loginUi:
[
  { name: "代理：", type: "text" },
  {
    name: "💡　　 源　　 站　　 更　　 新　　 💡",
    type: "button",
    action: "update()",
    style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 1}
  },
  { name: "查看当前", type: "button", action: "look(0)", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25} },
  { name: "查看历史", type: "button", action: "look(1)", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25} },
  { name: "恢复默认", type: "button", action: "test(0)", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25} },
  { name: "繁体搜索", type: "button", action: "search_TC()", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25} },
  { name: "繁简转换", type: "button", action: "TC_to_SC()", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25} },
  { name: "目录整理", type: "button", action: "settle()", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25} },

  { name: "༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击切换源站  ɞ´«ˇ༻", type: "button", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 1} },
  { name: "①肉漫屋❶", type: "button", action: "$(1)", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25} },
  { name: "②肉漫屋❷", type: "button", action: "$(2)", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25} },
  { name: "③肉漫屋❸", type: "button", action: "$(3)", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25} },

  {
    name: "💡　　 源　　 站　　 打　　 印　　 💡",
    type: "button",
    action: "test()",
    style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 1}
  }
]

var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
User = Checkwait(User);
if (User == true) {
    var list = java.getElements('.grid-cols-1.1@a');
    for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
        data.push({
            'name': list[i].select('.text-foreground')[0].text(),
            'author': '',
            'kind': '✦ ' + list[i].select('.text-sm')[2].text() + ',' + '♥ ' + list[i].select('.text-sm')[3].text(),
            'word': '',
            'latest': String(list[i].select('.text-sm')[1].text()).replace(/至:\s*/g, '').replace(/\s+第.*?话$/, '') + '〔' + String(list[i].select('.text-sm')[4].text()).replace(/(\d+)\/(\d+)\/(\d+)/g, '$3-$1-$2') + '〕',
            'intro': '',
            'cover': String(list[i].select('.bg-cover').attr('style')).replace(/.*"(.*?)".*/g, '$1'),
            'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('a').attr('href')
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
    if (!list[0] || !next_1.select('.grid-cols-1')[1].select('a')[0]) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") {
    var list = java.getElements('.px-2.py-4@a');

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "searchkey"), e);
    return Get('url') + '/search?term=' + e + '&page={{page-1}}';
}(key));
</js>
